page.title: 03Pubs in Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: {Pubs,Garages in Sherburn In Elmet.} There are five public houses,The Wheatsheaf,The Foresters Arms,The Red Bear,The White Swan and The Oddfellows Arms.They all serve bar meals lunch times and evenings.They offer darts,dominoes,electronic games and beer gardens.The Red Bear has weekly discos and bed and breakfast facilities.It is the oldest pub.It is at least 350 years old.It was an important coaching inn on the York to London route There are five garages in Sherburn. Henry's garage is in Kirkgate and sells petrol.Cliff Motors and Low Road garage are in Low Street.Cliff Motors sells cars but not petrol.Low Road garage sells petrol and repairs cars as do White Rose garage and Moor Lane garage which are both in Moor Lane.
